item.title: Getting started with Multivariate Multiple Regression
item.description: Multivariate Multiple Regression is the method of modeling multiple responses, or dependent variables, with a single set of predictor variables. For example, we might want to model both math and reading SAT scores as a function of gender, race, parent income, and so forth. This allows us to evaluate the relationship of, say, gender with each score. You may be thinking, â€œwhy not just run separate regressions for each dependent variable?
